title.rendered: The Learning Zone by School of Computing and Artificial Intelligence

content.rendered:
It’s 2021 and Regent College London are excited to bring you The Learning Zone. Created by The School of Computing & AI, the Learning Zone will feature monthly Guest Speaker events. We will be hosting guests from various industries to explore more about their life experiences, tips and tricks alongside a Q+A Session whereby attendees can ask to find out more! The sessions will take place at the end of each month, and we will be kicking off with our very first event on Friday 29th January 2021!


The first event features Tara McBride, whom has many years of experience within the IT Industry. Tara was previously the Head of Computing at a London University and is currently an IT Manager. During the 1 Hour event, Tara will:

  1. Share her experiences in successfully working in the IT Industry
  2. Share some ‘tips-to-success’ on how to use IT to help students and staff study and work effectively
  3. Introduce a new Computing and AI Group: ‘Women in Computing’ – an important part of the new Computing Society.

This will then be followed by an open Q+A Session.

We are excited to host Tara at the end of January and hope that both staff and students partake in the virtual event.

The full details of the event have been left below:

When: Friday 29th January 2021 – From 5:00pm-6:00pm

Duration: 1 Hour

Link to attend: https://bit.ly/3oG6Gnf
